__e: He was faced with a choice of either keep attacking me or pay for his wife's health.
The man we both knew... paid for that information with his life, a sacrifice I'm not willing to make.
You're saying she paid the man with his own money?
Didn't you see? When that guy paid me what I asked for that piece of junk, I saw how much he had.
He paid the guy with the money that he got from selling his meds.
But I think the family paid him to disappear.
I just paid him and left.
I paid him to leave me alone and keep quiet.
Yeah, and I paid for the tickets, and I want my money back, okay?
The other guy stayed down in the lobby and settled his bill.
He made bail, took a plea and walked with no jail time.
He paid me to kill my friend, and I didn't want to do it.
I was paid by another who was paid by a girl...
He came and paid me. Like I was a present.
My cousin Anna posed as his mother, and I gave her half my wages.
He paid her money so he could visit whenever he felt like it.
He was paying her to look after the girl.
